titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to Japanese trade with the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Senate: (1) renews its condemnation of the continued Vietnamese occupation of Cambodia; (2) condemns the trading policies of the Japanese Government which allow its private business sector to engage in developmental trade with Vietnam and previously allowed Japanese corporations to trade with Cuba; and (3) condemns specific Japanese practices regarding trade with Vietnam which provide long-term credits and developmental equipment.
